name: UIUserNotificationCategory
desc: Important:UIUserNotificationCategory is deprecated in iOS 10. Use UNNotificationCategory instead. A UIUserNotificationCategory object encapsulates information about custom actions that your app can perform in response to a local or push notification.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The name of the action group.

items.name: func actions(for: UIUserNotificationActionContext) -> [UIUserNotificationAction]?
items.desc: Returns the actions to be displayed for the given notification context.

items.name: enum UIUserNotificationActionContext
items.desc: Constants indicating the amount of space available for displaying actions in a notification.
